short_summary: Multiple Victoria-Class Plates and Spares for AZL Mast and Torque Motor
description: See attached tender documents for detailed information.
full_summary:
----------

### Government Tender Announcement

#### Multiple Victoria-Class Plates and Spares for AZL Mast and Torque Motor

Reference Number: cb-7847-39719047
Solicitation Number: W8482-231402/A
Publication Date: August 3, 2023
Tender Closing Date: February 14, 2024, 2:00 PM (EST)
Expected Contract Start Date: April 12, 2024
Expected Contract End Date: March 28, 2025

### Tender Description

The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking multiple Victoria-Class plates and spares for the AZL Mast and Torque Motor. The tender includes the following items:

* Item 1: Bearing Plate Assembly (GSIN 5985)
	+ Quantity: 2 units
	+ Delivery Location: Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Esquimalt
* Item 2: Bearing Plate Assembly (GSIN 5985)
	+ Quantity: 2 units
	+ Delivery Location: CFB Esquimalt
* Item 3: Ball Bearing (GSIN 3110)
	+ Quantity: 6 units
	+ Delivery Location: CFB Esquimalt
* Item 4: Ball Bearing (GSIN 3110)
	+ Quantity: 5 units
	+ Delivery Location: CFB Halifax
* Item 5: External Earthing System (GSIN 5820)
	+ Quantity: 2 units
	+ Delivery Location: CFB Esquimalt
* Item 6: Torque Motor (GSIN 6105)
	+ Quantity: 18 units
	+ Delivery Location: CFB Esquimalt
* Item 7: Torque Motor (GSIN 6105)
	+ Quantity: 1 unit
	+ Delivery Location: CFB Halifax

### Tender Requirements

* Suppliers must indicate the brand name, model, and/or part number and NCAGE for equivalent or substitute products.
* This procurement is subject to the Controlled Goods Program.
* The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

### Important Dates

* Tender Closing Date: February 14, 2024, 2:00 PM (EST)
* Expected Contract Start Date: April 12, 2024
* Expected Contract End Date: March 28, 2025

### Contact Information

* Contracting Entity: Department of National Defence (DND)
* Contact
